text: syrio_forel Yah ! Left high , left low .
syrio_forel Right low , lunge right .
steward_of_house_stark If you break anything , the Septa will have my head . What is ... .
septa_mordane Your sister knew perfectly well we were to leave today .
sansa_stark She did n't forget . She 's with her dancing master .
septa_mordane Hush ! Go back to your room .
sansa_stark What is it ? What 's happening ?
septa_mordane Do as I told you . Run !
syrio_forel This way ! Left , right .
arya_stark You said right , but you went left .
syrio_forel And now you are a dead girl .
arya_stark Only 'cause you lied .
syrio_forel My tongue lied .
arya_stark I was so . I watched , but you ... .
syrio_forel Watching is not seeing , dead girl .
meryn_trant Arya Stark , come with us .
syrio_forel And why is it that Lord Eddard is sending Lannister men in place of his own ? I am wondering .
meryn_trant Mind your place , dancing master .
arya_stark My father would n't send you .
arya_stark And I do n't have to go with you if I do n't want .
meryn_trant Take her .
syrio_forel Are you men or snakes , that you would threaten a child ?
kings_guard Get out of my way , little man .
syrio_forel I am Syrio Forel .
kings_guard Foreign bastard .
syrio_forel And you will be speaking to me with more respect .
meryn_trant Kill the Braavosi . Bring the girl .
syrio_forel Arya child , we are done with dancing for the day .
meryn_trant Bloody oafs .
syrio_forel Be gone now , Arya .
arya_stark Come with me . Run .
syrio_forel The first sword of Braavos does not run .
syrio_forel What do we say to the God of death ?
arya_stark Not today .
syrio_forel Go .
arya_stark Not today . Not today .
sansa_stark Stay away from me .
sandor_clegane Who do you think sent me ?
arya_stark Needle .
stable_boy There she is .
arya_stark What do you want ?
stable_boy I want you , wolf girl . Come here .
arya_stark Leave me be . My father 's a lord . He 'll reward you .
stable_boy She 'll reward me , the Queen !
arya_stark Stay away !
lord_varys Lord Stark , you must be thirsty .
eddard_stark Varys .
lord_varys I promise you it is n't poisoned .
eddard_stark What about my daughters ?
lord_varys The younger one seems to have escaped the castle .
eddard_stark And Sansa ?
lord_varys Still engaged to Joffrey .
eddard_stark You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing .
lord_varys And would again , My Lord .
eddard_stark The madness of mercy . That she might save her children .
lord_varys Ah , the children . It is always the innocents who suffer .
eddard_stark The Queen ca n't kill me . Cat holds her brother .
lord_varys The wrong brother sadly .
eddard_stark If that 's true , then slit my throat and be done with it .
lord_varys Not today , My Lord .
eddard_stark Tell me something , Varys .
lord_varys The Realm , My Lord .
jeor_mormont It 's Othor , without a doubt .
othell_yarwyck The other one is Jafer Flowers , My Lord , less the hand the wolf tore off .
jeor_mormont Any sign of Benjen or the rest of his party ?
jon_snow Just these two , My Lord . Been dead awhile , I 'd say .
jeor_mormont Mmm .
samwell_tarly The smell .
othell_yarwyck What smell ?
samwell_tarly There is none .
jon_snow We should burn them .
othell_yarwyck Snow 's not wrong , My Lord .
jeor_mormont I want Maester Aemon to examine them first .
othell_yarwyck You heard him .
alliser_thorne Lord Commander , Maester Aemon awaits you in his chambers . A raven from King 's Landing .
nights_watch_brother Come on , move 'em out .
jeor_mormont Bring me a horn of ale , Snow , and pour one for yourself .
jon_snow Is there any word of my father ?
jeor_mormont Sit .
jeor_mormont I hope you 're not thinking of doing anything stupid .
jon_snow My sisters were in King 's Landing too .
jeor_mormont I 'm sure they 'll be treated gently .
lord_varys Your father has proved to be an awful traitor , dear .
grand_maester_pycelle King Robert 's body was still warm when Lord Eddard began plotting to steal Joffrey 's rightful throne .
sansa_stark He would n't do that . He knows how much I love Joffrey .
cersei_lannister Sansa sweetling , you are innocent of any wrong .
grand_maester_pycelle A child born of a traitor 's seed is no fit consort for our King .
sansa_stark No , I 'm not .
petyr_baelish The girl is innocent , Your Grace .
cersei_lannister Little dove , you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother , the eldest .
sansa_stark Robb .
cersei_lannister Word of your father 's arrest will reach him soon , no doubt .
sansa_stark If ... .if I could see my father , talk to him about ... .
cersei_lannister You disappoint me , child .
sansa_stark I only meant that ... what will happen to him ?
cersei_lannister That depends .
sansa_stark On ... on what ?
cersei_lannister On your brother . And on you .
robb_stark Treason ? Sansa wrote this ?
maester_luwin It is your sister 's hand , but the Queen 's words .
robb_stark Joffrey puts my father in chains , now he wants his ass kissed ?
maester_luwin This is a royal command , My Lord .
robb_stark I wo n't refuse . His Grace summons me to King 's Landing , I 'll go to King 's Landing .
maester_luwin All of them , My Lord ?
robb_stark They 've all sworn to defend my father , have they not ?
maester_luwin They have .
maester_luwin Yeah .
theon_greyjoy Are you afraid ?
robb_stark I must be .
theon_greyjoy Good .
robb_stark Why is that good ?
theon_greyjoy It means you 're not stupid .
catelyn_stark You 've had this since dawn ?
lysa_arryn He sent it to me , not you .
catelyn_stark A courtesy ? ! My husband has been taken prisoner .
lysa_arryn A war ? Your son against the Lannisters ?
catelyn_stark Ned rots in a dungeon and you speak of patience ? He is your brother by law !
lysa_arryn Family means everything to me .
robin_arryn I 'm hungry .
lysa_arryn Hush now , darling . You just ate .
catelyn_stark You will not support us then ? Do I understand you correctly ?
robin_arryn But I 'm hungry !
lysa_arryn Soon , love , soon .
catelyn_stark That is what I ask .
lysa_arryn Go on , sweet . Time for your bath . I 'll feed you after .
catelyn_stark If you fear for the safety of your son ... .
lysa_arryn Of course I fear for the safety of my son !
catelyn_stark And that is why we have to stop them .
lysa_arryn The knights of the Vale will stay in the Vale where they belong , to protect their Lord .
bronn Will you shut up ? There 's hill tribes all around here .
tyrion_lannister If I 'm going to die , it may as well be with a song in my heart .
bronn I should just take your food and leave you here .
tyrion_lannister Starve , most likely .
bronn You do n't think I 'd do it , do you ?
tyrion_lannister What do you want , Bronn ? Gold ? Women ? Golden women ?
bronn Fair enough .
tyrion_lannister Though I would treasure your friendship .
bronn Tyrion . Tyrion . Tyrion .
tyrion_lannister Come , share our fire .
shagga When you meet your Gods , you tell them Shagga Son of Dolf of the Stone Crows sent you .
tyrion_lannister I am Tyrion son of Tywin of Clan Lannister .
tyrion_lannister In my own bed , at the age of 80 with a bellyful of wine and a girl 's mouth around my cock .
tyrion_lannister No no no no no ! My , my House is rich and powerful .
shagga We have no use for a half man 's promises .
tyrion_lannister Half a man maybe , but at least I have the courage to face my enemies .
shagga You think you can win us over with your trinkets ?
tyrion_lannister That trinket is worth more than everything your tribe owns .
shagga What is """" this """" ?
tyrion_lannister The Vale of Arryn .
alliser_thorne Now there 's a rare sight . Not only a bastard , but a traitor 's bastard .
samwell_tarly Jon , no ! Jon , stop , put it down !
alliser_thorne Blood will always tell . You 'll hang for this , bastard .
jeor_mormont I told you not to do anything stupid . You 're confined to quarters . Go .
jon_snow Ghost , what 's wrong ? Is something out there ?
jon_snow Commander ?
jon_snow Stay .
jon_snow Hello ?
jeor_mormont Snow ! ?
jon_snow Commander !
jon_snow Move move !
daenerys_targaryen What did they do ?
rakharo Lamb men make good slaves . Khal Drogo will make a gift of them to the slavers .
daenerys_targaryen I thought the Dothraki did n't believe in money .
jorah_mormont Gold to hire ships , Princess . Ships to sail to Westeros .
daenerys_targaryen Jorah , make them stop .
jorah_mormont Khaleesi ?
daenerys_targaryen You heard me .
jorah_mormont These men have shed blood for their Khal .
rakharo She is a lamb girl , Khaleesi . The riders do her honor .
jorah_mormont Princess , you have a gentle heart , but this is how it 's always been .
daenerys_targaryen I do not have a gentle heart , Ser . Do as I command or Khal Drogo will know the reason why .
rakharo Kash qoy qoyi thira disse . Me qorasokh anni !
jorah_mormont Come .
dothraki_man Anha afichak mae m'arakhoon !
jorah_mormont What do you want done with them ?
daenerys_targaryen Bring her to me . And those women there .
jorah_mormont You can not claim them all , Princess .
daenerys_targaryen I can , and I will .
mago Me Fati ! Khaleesi vazha anhaan qorasokh anni , ch'anha afichak mae m'arakhoon anni !
khal_drogo Me vastoe hatif anni ; ahhazaan yer Nemo vacchaki .
khal_drogo Moon of my life . Mago says you have taken his spoils .
daenerys_targaryen Mago speaks the truth , my sun and stars . I have claimed many daughters this day , so they can not be mounted .
khal_drogo This is the way of war . These women are slaves now to do with as we please .
daenerys_targaryen It pleases me to keep them safe .
qotho Does the horse mate with the lamb ?
daenerys_targaryen The dragons feeds on horse and lamb alike .
mago You are a foreigner . You do not command me .
daenerys_targaryen I am Khaleesi . I do command you .
khal_drogo See how fierce she grows ?
mago A Khal who takes orders from a foreign whore is no Khal .
khal_drogo Ohosa . Os .
khal_drogo The beetles will feed on your eyes . The worms will crawl through your lungs .
khal_drogo The rain will fall on your rotting skin ... .
khal_drogo Until nothing is left of you but bones !
mago First you have to kill me !
daenerys_targaryen My sun and stars is wounded .
khal_drogo A scratch , moon of my life .
daenerys_targaryen Where are the healers ?
khal_drogo This is the bite of a fly .
mirri_maz_duur I can help the great rider with his cut .
qotho The Khal needs no help from slaves who lie with sheep .
daenerys_targaryen She is mine let her speak .
mirri_maz_duur Thank you , silver lady .
daenerys_targaryen Who are you ?
mirri_maz_duur I am named Mirri Maz Duur .
qotho A witch .
mirri_maz_duur My mother was Godswife here before me .
qotho Too many words . A witch 's words poison the ears .
mirri_maz_duur lamb or lion , his wound must be washed and sewn or it will fester .
daenerys_targaryen Let her clean your wound , my sun and stars .
greatjon_umber For 30 years I 've been making corpses out of men , boy .
robb_stark Galbart Glover will lead the Van .
greatjon_umber The bloody Wall will melt before an Umber marches behind a Glover .
robb_stark You are welcome to do so , Lord Umber .
greatjon_umber Oathbreaker , is it ? !
greatjon_umber I 'll not sit here and swallow insults from a boy so green he pisses grass .
robb_stark My Lord father taught me it was death to bare steel against your Liege Lord .
greatjon_umber Your meat ... is bloody tough .
bran_stark What is it ? What 's happened ?
robb_stark Shh , it 's all right .
bran_stark Where are you going ?
robb_stark South . For father .
bran_stark But it 's the middle of the night .
robb_stark The Lannisters have spies everywhere .
bran_stark They have more men than we do .
robb_stark Aye , they do .
bran_stark Ca n't I come with you ? I can ride now . You 've seen me riding .
robb_stark There must always be a Stark at Winterfell .
bran_stark I will .
robb_stark I 'll send letters whenever I can , but if you do n't hear from me , do n't be scared .
bran_stark How long have you been hiding out there ?
rickon_stark They 've all gone away .
bran_stark They 'll be back soon .
rickon_stark No , they wo n't .
bran_stark Please watch over Robb .
osha You hear them , boy ? The Old Gods are answering you .
bran_stark What are you doing here ?
osha They 're my Gods too .
bran_stark You 're not a slave .
bran_stark Well , your friend did put a knife to my throat .
bran_stark What did you mean about hearing the Gods ?
osha You asked them , they 're answering you .
bran_stark It 's only the wind .
osha Well , there 's a big man .
bran_stark Go back and find your clothes , Hodor .
hodor Hodor .
bran_stark Are there really giants beyond the Wall ?
osha Giants and worse than giants .
samwell_tarly They were touched by White Walkers .
jon_snow How do you know that ?
samwell_tarly I read about it in a book . A very old book in Maester Aemon 's library .
jon_snow What else did the book say ?
samwell_tarly The White Walkers sleep beneath the ice for thousands of years .
pypar And when they wake up , what ?
samwell_tarly I hope The Wall is high enough .
rodrik_cassel Summer snows , My Lady .
catelyn_stark Robb 's brought the North with him .
robb_stark The River Lords are falling back with Jaime Lannister at their heels .
greatjon_umber One army or two , the Kings in the North threw back hosts ten times this large .
robb_stark Mother !
catelyn_stark You look well .
greatjon_umber Lady Catelyn , you 're a welcome sight in these troubled times .
theon_greyjoy We had not thought to meet you here , My Lady .
catelyn_stark I had not thought to be here .
greatjon_umber You heard her ! Move your asses ! Come on , out .
rodrik_cassel Jon .
greatjon_umber You 're not wasting away , are you ?
catelyn_stark I remember the day you came into this world red - faced and squalling .
robb_stark There was no one else .
catelyn_stark No one ? Who were those men I saw here ?
robb_stark None of them are Starks .
catelyn_stark All of them are seasoned in battle .
robb_stark If you think you can send me back to Winterfell ... .
catelyn_stark Oh , would that I could .
robb_stark There was a letter . From Sansa .
catelyn_stark From the Queen , you mean .
robb_stark No .
catelyn_stark How many men do you have ?
robb_stark 18,000 . If I go to King 's Landing and bend my knee to Joffrey ... .
catelyn_stark you would never be allowed to leave . No .
robb_stark And if I lose ?
catelyn_stark Do you know what happened to the Targaryen children , when the Mad King fell ?
robb_stark They were butchered in their sleep .
catelyn_stark On the orders of Tywin Lannister . And the years have not made him kinder .
robb_stark Well , that makes it simple then .
catelyn_stark I suppose it does .
tyrion_lannister From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone .
shagga Best for Tyrion son of Tywin . Not best for me .
tyrion_lannister And feed it to the goats , yes .
tyrion_lannister Uncle . Father .
tywin_lannister The rumors of your demise were unfounded .
tyrion_lannister Sorry to disappoint you .
tywin_lannister And who are these Companions of yours ?
tywin_lannister This is Shagga Son of Dolf , Chieftain of the Stone Crows .
bronn You would n't know him .
tyrion_lannister May I present My Lord Father , Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister .
tywin_lannister You left us no choice . The honor of the House was at stake .
tyrion_lannister We have our differences , Jaime and I.
jaime_lannister He 's been covering himself in glory .
kevan_lannister Jaime smashed the River Lords at the Golden Tooth , and now lays siege to Riverrun , Catelyn Stark 's homeland .
tyrion_lannister And the Starks ? Lord Eddard ?
tywin_lannister Is our hostage .
tyrion_lannister How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned ?
tywin_lannister Robert Baratheon is dead .
tyrion_lannister My sister rules , you mean .
kevan_lannister Stark 's son has called his banners .
tywin_lannister A green boy .
tyrion_lannister Maybe . Though the boy does have a certain belligerence .
lannister_messenger If it please My Lord , Ser Addam bids me report that the Northmen have crossed the neck .
tywin_lannister The wolf rushes into the lion 's jaws .
kevan_lannister At once , My Lord .
tywin_lannister It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors .
shagga Only if the half man fights with us .
rodrik_cassel The scouts report Lord Tywin moves north .
greatjon_umber No , we need to get around him and break Jaime Lannister 's siege of Riverrun .
robb_stark To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins .
theon_greyjoy Lord Frey controls that bridge .
"catelyn_stark """ The late Lord Frey """" my father calls him .
theon_greyjoy Robb 's right .
greatjon_umber So what 's it gon na be ? Do we move against Jaime or Lord Tywin ?
stark_guard Your pardon , my lords .
greatjon_umber Do n't worry , lad .
robb_stark Where did you find him ?
stark_guard In the brush above the encampment .
robb_stark How high did you get ?
lannister_scout 20,000 . Maybe more .
robb_stark My father understands mercy , when there is room for it .
catelyn_stark Robb .
robb_stark Tell Lord Tywin , Winter is coming for him .
lannister_scout Yes , My Lord . Thank you , My Lord .
greatjon_umber Are you touched , boy ? ! Letting him go ?
robb_stark You call me boy again .
robb_stark Go on .
greatjon_umber Oi .
grand_maester_pycelle It is also the wish of His Grace , that his loyal servant Janos Slynt , Commander of the City Watch ... .
sansa_stark Ser Aron .
grand_maester_pycelle Be at once raised to the rank of Lord .
sansa_stark Lord Gyles .
grand_maester_pycelle And granted the ancient seat of Harrenhal , and that his sons and grandsons shall hold this honor after him , until the end of time .
cersei_lannister Ser Barristan Selmy .
barristan_selmy Your Grace , I am yours to command .
cersei_lannister Rise , Ser Barristan .
barristan_selmy Your Grace , the Kingsguard is a sworn brotherhood .
cersei_lannister Whose death , Ser Barristan ? Yours or your King 's ?
joffrey_baratheon You let my father die .
barristan_selmy Your Grace ... .
cersei_lannister The Council has determined that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard .
barristan_selmy The man who profaned his blade with the blood of the King he had sworn to defend !
cersei_lannister Careful , Ser .
lord_varys We have nothing but gratitude for your long service , good Ser .
barristan_selmy A hall to die in and men to bury me .
petyr_baelish A naked Knight , apparently .
barristan_selmy Even now I could cut through the five of you like carving a cake !
sansa_stark Your Grace .
joffrey_baratheon Come forward , My Lady .
cersei_lannister Do you have some business for the King and the Council , Sansa ?
sansa_stark I do .
sansa_stark As it please Your Grace , I ask mercy for my father , Lord Eddard Stark , who was Hand of the King .
grand_maester_pycelle Treason is a noxious weed .
joffrey_baratheon Let her speak .
sansa_stark Thank you , Your Grace .
petyr_baelish Do you deny your father 's crime ?
sansa_stark No , My Lords . I know he must be punished .
joffrey_baratheon He said I was n't the King . Why did he say that ?
sansa_stark He was badly hurt .
lord_varys A child 's faith Such sweet innocence .
grand_maester_pycelle Treason is treason !
joffrey_baratheon Anything else ?
sansa_stark If you still have any affection in your heart for me , please do me this kindness , Your Grace .
joffrey_baratheon Your sweet words have moved me .
sansa_stark He will .
